reviewText:
Anyone who knows and loves the Judds will really appreciate this video. It was released by MPI  Home Entertainment in 1988. The sound and picture quality is excellent and the Running time is 50 minutes. Naomi Judd (mother) was born in1946 and Wynonna (daughter) was born in 1964. That would make them 29 and 51 respectively today. They started their career in8e vand were tryly overnight successes and at that time they were 37 and 19. Their career started in 1983 and though their greatest success and popularity is not what it was in the early years ,and there were even times when it was on hold,particularly in 1991 when Naomi was diagnosed with Hepatis B.They continue to record and perform today.
 They were ,without doubt the top Motther & Daughter act in Country Music. The video has a lot of personal information about the Judds,their family and their busy life ,particularly "on ther road" In spite of their great popularity they always were down to earth with their fans and fit the saying "what you see is what you get.". They spent so much time on the road performing that they often said,"We're in a different Parking Lot and Hotel every day."
Along with all the conversation and personal photos and home movies several of their popular songs are included.;  GIRL'S NIGHT OUT
  DON'T BE CRUEL
  LEAVE ME LONLEY (Gary Morris)
  WHY NOT ME
  GIVE A LITTLE LOVE
  OLD PICTURES
  CRY MYSELF TO SLEEP
  A MOTHER'S SMILE
 This video was released at the height of their career in 1988 when they were 42 and 24.

This is Ashley Judd's work.  It is so much fun to watch!
You will enjoy this very much!  And if your not all ready you become a big fan and want all their music.
enjoy!
I LOVED THE VIDEO, I FOUND THAT THEIR YOUNGER YEARS ARE MORE EXCITING THAN THE REST. WYNONNA HAS SUCH A GREAT TASTE FOR LIFE. I CAN'T WAIT TO SEE MORE VIDEOS OF WYNONNA COMING OUT.
